HT_Text_NoteTitle_DonateMuseum01.message: Make a Donation to the Abydos Museum

HT_Text_NoteTitle_FindImhotep01.message: Find Imhotep on Sun Shrine Island

HT_Text_NoteTitle_GetBookOfTheDead01.message: Find the Book of the Dead

HT_Text_NoteTitle_VisitAnubis01.message: Visit Anubis at Great Wall Entrance I

HT_Text_NoteTitle_DeactivateBeams01.message: Disable the Force field Imprisoning the Nomad's Wife

HT_Text_NoteTitle_VisitImhotep01.message: Visit Imhotep in the Sun Shrine

HT_Text_NoteTitle_CrownQuest01.message: Retrieve the Sacred Crown of Abydos

HT_Text_NoteTitle_SmallCanalCreatures01.message: Clear the Narrow Canal of Monsters

HT_Text_NoteTitle_VisitKemmet01.message: Deliver the Physician's Note to Kemmet

HT_Text_NoteTitle_CrownQuest02.message: Retrieve the Sacred Crown of Uruk

HT_Text_NoteTitle_FindHeliopolisDungeon0.message: Find the Lost Temple of Heliopolis

HT_Text_NoteTitle_CollectRosettaPieces01.message: Retrieve the Ancient Rosetta Stone Pieces

HT_Text_NoteTitle_MeetArchaeologist01.message: Visit the Archaeologist in the Bedouin Outpost

HT_Text_NoteTitle_TranslateObelisks01.message: Translate the Golden Obelisks of Heliopolis

HT_Text_NoteTitle_CrownQuest03.message: Retrieve the Sacred Crown of Heliopolis

HT_Text_Note_FindBlade01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Your first quest is to find the long lost Blade of Osiris. This powerful weapon disappeared long ago in the inhospitable landscape around the Castle of Uruk.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_GetLetter01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Retrieve Nefertiti's Letter and return it to her.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_CollectAmulets01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Collect the 8 Old Amulets and return them to your Aunt Seti.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_GetToHeliopolis01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Once you have used the Abydos Amulet, Imhotep wants you to seek transport to Heliopolis and meet up with him as soon as possible.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_FindPearls01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Find 3 Pearls and give them to the Abydosian man.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_DonateMuseum01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>The Curator of Abydos Museum is offering a gift when you make your first donation.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_GetAbydosPasscard01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>The Guards in Abydos Canal will not allow access to the Council Chambers. Perhaps you should return to Abydos later in your quest when you have suitable identification.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_FindImhotep01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Imhotep can be found on Sun Shrine Island. Visit him and find out what information he has for you.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_GetBookOfTheDead01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Find the Book of the Dead so you can summon Bas-Ket when you find a Canopic Vase. Imhotep believes the book is being held in the Cursed Palace.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_VisitAnubis01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Anubis is responsible for cursing the inhabitants of the Cursed Palace. With the Wings of Ibis you can enter Great Wall Entrance I, and pay a visit to Anubis.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_AnubisQuest01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Capture 3 Fire Armadillos using Capture Beetles and bring them to Anubis.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_VisitFarmers01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>The Farmer's Brother invited you to visit their farm in Heliopolis.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_SaveNomadWife01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Find where the Nomad's Wife is being held and rescue her.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_DeactivateBeams01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>The force field imprisoning the Nomad's Wife seems to be powered by three coloured beams. Find a way to disable them.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_VisitImhotep01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Imhotep has requested that you go and speak to him in the Sun Shrine.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_CrownQuest01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>You must find the Sacred Crown of Abydos and return it to Anubis in Heliopolis.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_MayorIll01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Apparently the Mayor has been taken seriously ill. Perhaps the people in Abydos Council Chambers could use your help.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_SmallCanalCreatures01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>The Guard near the entrance to the Narrow Canal has offered you a Portal Amulet if you can clear the area of monsters.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_CureMayor01.message:
You must find 5 Healing Herbs and bring them to the Physician in the Abydos Council Chambers.

With the herbs the Physician should be able to prepare a cure for the Mayor's mysterious illness.

HT_Text_Note_VisitKemmet01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>You must deliver the Physician's Note to Kemmet, who lives near the Grand Canal. He may be able to help you find the Healing Herbs.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_FindPoliticians01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Find the traitorous politicians who stole the Sacred Crown of Abydos and win back what is rightfully yours.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_CrownQuest02.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>You must find the Sacred Crown of Uruk and return it to Anubis in Heliopolis.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_FindHeliopolisDungeon01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Find the entrance to the Lost Temple of Heliopolis. The Pharaoh's Wife believes that it lies in the South Desert of Heliopolis.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_CollectRosettaPieces01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Find the 6 Rosetta Stone Pieces hidden inside the Lost Temple of Heliopolis and bring them to the Archaeologist.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_MeetArchaeologist01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Check on the Archaeologist's findings in the Bedouin Outpost. The outpost can be found by swimming through the underwater passage from the Cursed Palace.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_TranslateObelisks01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Use the Rosetta Stone to translate the 5 Golden Obelisks of Heliopolis and report your findings to the Archaeologist in the Bedouin Outpost.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_SmallObelisk01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>When the Age of Osiris comes to an end...<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_SmallObelisk02.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd> ...the Shadow of Set will descend upon us...<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_SmallObelisk03.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>...but a great warrior by the name of Sphinx...<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_SmallObelisk04.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>...will emerge as the Chosen One...<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_SmallObelisk05.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>...to defend the Eternal Eye of Ra.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_Prophecy.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>When the Age of Osiris comes to an end, the Shadow of Set will descend upon us, but a great warrior by the name of Sphinx, will emerge as the Chosen One, to defend the Eternal Eye of Ra.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_TempleTest01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Complete the Uruk Temple Trial and return what you find to the Urukite.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_CrownQuest03.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>You must find the Sacred Crown of Heliopolis and return it to Anubis.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_MotherQuest01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Capture the dogs in Heliopolis Cursed Palace and return them to their owner.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Note_DefeatSeth01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>Your final destiny is to face Set in the devastated world of Uruk.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd><E>

HT_Text_Notes_Test_D2.message:
Set has been hiding in his secret palace while orchestrating the destruction of Heliopolis...

You must find his lair and put an end to his plans...

To find where his secret palace is, you will need to talk to the Hittite village elder. Bring him some whiskey to loosen his tongue.

HT_Text_Notes_Test_T3.message: Deliver note from King Sobek of Akaria.

HT_Text_Notes_Test_D3.message:
After uncovering Ishka's scheme of encouraging a war between the people of Abydos and Akaria...

King Sobek needs you to deliver a notice of truce to the Mayor of Abydos.

HT_Text_Notes_Test_D4.message:
The Mayor of Abydos is ill. You will need to talk to the Physician about finding a cure...

The Physician lives in the canal that divides the north and south of Abydos.
